This folder configuration (`v11`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 18. Merge all the resources in this folder into `drawable-hdpi`.
This folder configuration (`v11`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 18. Merge all the resources in this folder into `drawable-mdpi`.

Hardcoded string "0:00", should use `@string` resource
Hardcoded string "0:00", should use `@string` resource
Replace the <fragment> tag with FragmentContainerView.
Replace the <fragment> tag with FragmentContainerView.
Replace the <fragment> tag with FragmentContainerView.
Prefer "`ifRoom`" instead of "`always`"
Did you mean "CC!" instead of "CC1"?
This folder configuration (`v11`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 18. Merge all the resources in this folder into `values`.
It will always be more efficient to use more specific change events if you can. Rely on `notifyDataSetChanged` as a last resort.
`onTouch` lambda should call `View#performClick` when a click is detected
Custom view ``VideoView`` has `setOnTouchListener` called on it but does not override `performClick`
Use `ResourcesCompat.getDrawable()`
Use `ResourcesCompat.getDrawable()`
Unnecessary; SDK_INT is always >= 18
Unnecessary; SDK_INT is always >= 18
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `CustomVolleyRequest` which has field `context` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES javadoc for details.
